author: 0xyukino
content: Hello, how can I find the latest updates on rip-7560?

author: samwilsn
content:
I haven't looked too deeply at the go code yet (go scares me), but how does this look so far for the output from `ethereum-spec-evm statetest`:

```json
[{

    {
      "tx": "0x6143c89384b58f92fceda500e24e3ffe89a30c5441620fd1f3234a98ebc8a8d4",
      "traces": [
        {"pc": 0,"op": 96,"gas": "0x3c9ebc","gasCost": "0x3","memSize": 0,"stack": [],"depth": 1,"refund": 0,"opName": "PUSH1"},
        {"pc": 2,"op": 96,"gas": "0x3c9eb9","gasCost": "0x3","memSize": 0,"stack": ["0x1"],"depth": 1,"refund": 0,"opName": "PUSH1"},
        {"pc": 4,"op": 1,"gas": "0x3c9eb6","gasCost": "0x3","memSize": 0,"stack": ["0x1","0x1"],"depth": 1,"refund": 0,"opName": "ADD"},

        {"pc": 7,"op": 85,"gas": "0x3c9eb0","gasCost": "0x4e20","memSize": 0,"stack": ["0x2","0x0"],"depth": 1,"refund": 0,"opName": "SSTORE"},
        {"pc": 8,"op": 0,"gas": "0x3c5090","gasCost": "0x0","memSize": 0,"stack": [],"depth": 1,"refund": 0,"opName": "STOP"},
        {"output": "","gasUsed": "0x4e2c"}

  ],
  "error": "post state root mismatch: got 540c916c6cf7d66d126f17a0ae6629dfd73444f394f12d0cff98ab11450cfbcb, want 824d2219f7aeda8c6055bfb967db764cc4297a6656216ef4abc85f5685685217"
```
